message.body: Hey speaking of movies, i also heard good things about silver linings playbook and that one takes place in Philly. They live in ridley hah
I heard of that movie's Philly connection but didn't know the characters were from Ridley. I should watch that.
Alright i got it! So theres space on the jackson hole trip if you want. You will be the 9th person and you'll have a bed since Richard's fri
end isn't able to make it. You should come!
Great! I just need to find a plane ticket now.
